name: Asian-Style Enhanced Stock
keywords: chicken broth, ginger, soy sauce, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 scallions, trimmed and cut into 1-inch lengths
2 thin slices fresh ginger, unpeeled, or 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except salt and ground pepper in a medium saucepan, and bring just about to a boil. Turn the heat a little lower, and simmer, uncovered, 10 to 20 minutes. Strain, taste and adjust seasonings.
